description: The work calendar entry shall be defined as a calendar entry with a start date and time, a finish date and time, and an entry type.
title: Work calendar entry
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The work calendar definition entry that defines this work calendar entry.
The work calendar entry(s) makes up part of this work calendar entry as the whole
The work calendar entry property(s) in part defines this work calendar entry.

startTime.title: Start time
startTime.description: Defines the starting date and time of the work calendar entry.
startTime.comment: the spec declared this field 'Start datetime' we renamed as 'Start time' to align with other models in Part2.

endTime.title: End time
endTime.description: Defines the finishing date and time of the work calendar entry.
endTime.comment: the spec declared this field 'Finish datetime' we renamed as 'end time' to align with other models in Part2.

entryType.title: Entry type
entryType.description: Defines the type of work calendar definition entry. There are no standard entry types defined.
